aspguidp.helper

Class AtomHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • aspguidp.helper.AtomHelper

  • public class AtomHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class which provides static methods regarding to the management of Atom instances.

    • Method Detail

      • extractAtomStringsFromProgramCode

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> extractAtomStringsFromProgramCode(java.lang.String programCodeString)
        Extract string representations of atoms from the given program code.
        Parameters:
        programCodeString - code of the program to extract atom strings from
        Returns:
        list of string representations fo atoms extracted from the given program code.

      • extractAtomStringsFromAnswerSet

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> extractAtomStringsFromAnswerSet(java.lang.String answerSetString)
        Extract string representations of atoms from the given answer set string.
        Parameters:
        answerSetString - string representation of the answer set to extract atom strings from
        Returns:
        list of string representations of atoms extracted from the given answer set

      • atomsFromStringRepresentations

        public static java.util.List<Atom> atomsFromStringRepresentations(java.util.List<java.lang.String> atomStrings)
        Get a list of atom instances from a list of string representations of atoms. If an atom string representation from the given list is invalid, an exception is printed to stderr. The returned list will contain atom instances for every atom string representation which was valid.
        Parameters:
        atomStrings - list of string representations of atoms
        Returns:
        list of atom instances

      • groupAtomsByPredicateName

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<Atom>> groupAtomsByPredicateName(java.util.Collection<Atom> atoms)
        Group a given collection of atoms by the predicate names of the atoms
        Parameters:
        atoms - collection of atom instances which is grouped by their predicate name
        Returns:
        map which contains predicate names as key and lists of respective atoms as values

      • getProgramCode

        public static java.lang.String getProgramCode(java.util.Collection<Atom> atoms)
        Generate the program code which can be used in an asp program for the given atoms.
        Parameters:
        atoms - atoms which are set to the program code
        Returns:
        string containing the program code for the given atom instances

      • getProgramCodeLines

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getProgramCodeLines(java.util.Collection<java.util.List<Atom>> atomLines)
        Generate the program code which can be used in an asp program for the given atom instances. Each list in the list of lists are written to the program code as one line. This enables the generation of formatted program code (for example: write atoms with the same predicate name to the same program code line).
        Parameters:
        atomLines - list of list of atom instances. each list of atom instances will be set to the program code as single line
        Returns:
        string containing the program code for the given atom instances
